alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 11 at 3:19AM MST until January 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 30 to 40 below zero. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County, South Laramie Range, South Laramie Range Foothills and Central Laramie County. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
